channel.title: The Lord of the Rings Radio Network - The Return of the Podcast
channel.description: The Return of the Podcast is a podcast devoted to the discussion of the works of J.R.R. Tolkien.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2005 Lord of the Rings Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: The one podcast to rule them all!
channel.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe

item.title: The Return of the Podcast Episode 2.1
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 2.1 of The Return of the Podcast, released February 2007. The return episode of LOTR Radio. In this episode I announce the creation of The Lord of the Rings Radio Network, and I discuss heroism in Tolkien's work.
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, movie, heroism, hobbit

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.9
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.9 (originally released as episode IX) of Lord of the Rings Radio, released March 2006. In the ninth episode of Lord of the Rings Radio we have a news segment, a Tolkien art listener contribution, LOTR gaming, and Turin Turambar as our character discussion.
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, movie, turin, battle, for, middle, earth

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.8
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.8 (originally released as episode VIII) of Lord of the Rings Radio, released January 2006. In the eighth episode of Lord of the Rings Radio we have our first news segment, a look at Tolkien's bibliography, a review of Roverandom, Galadriel is our character disussion, and we have...
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, movie, galadriel, roverandom

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.7
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.7 (originally released as episode VII) of Lord of the Rings Radio, released November 2005. In the seventh episode of Lord of the Rings Radio I review the documentary Ringers - Lord of the Fans, list my top ten Tolkien related Christmas gifts, and Tom Bombadil is our character...
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, movie, saruman, fellowship, ring, hobbit, ringers, bombadil

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.6
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.6 (originally released as episode VI) of Lord of the Rings Radio, released October 2005. In the sixth episode of Lord of the Rings Radio I review FOTR the movie, discuss some of the spooky aspects of Tolkiens writings. We have Saruman for a character discussion, and a poetry...
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, movie, saruman, fellowship, ring, hobbit

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.5
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.5 (originally released as episode V) of Lord of the Rings Radio, released September 2005. In the fifth episode of Lord of the Rings Radio I discuss the character Gandalf, I review The Hobbit (the animated feature), and we have a poetry reading by a listener.
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, movie, gandalf, hobbit

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.4
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.4 (originally released as episode IV) of Lord of the Rings Radio, released August 2005. The fourth episode of Lord of the Rings Radio is a complaint-fest about the movie trilogy. I discuss what bothers me most about the movies.
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, movie, trilogy, complaints, hobbit

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.3
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.3 (originally released as episode III) of Lord of the Rings Radio, released July 2005. In the third episode of LOTR Radio I discuss Tolkiens messages & Tolkien collectibles. Our character discussion is on Eowyn, I review Fellowship! the Musical, and we have a poem reading by...
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, harry, potter, hobbit, collectibles, eowyn

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.2
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.2 (originally released as episode II)of Lord of the Rings Radio, released June 2005. In the second episode of LOTR Radio I discuss how the movie trilogy has effected long-time Tolkien fans, Tolkien fan fiction, the character Faramir, and also read a poem from The Lord of the...
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, harry, potter, hobbit, fellowship, fan, fiction, faramir

item.title: Lord of the Rings Radio Episode 1.1
item.itunes:author: Aaron Wolfe
item.description: Episode 1.1 (originally released as episode I) of Lord of the Rings Radio, released May 2005. In our first episode of LOTR Radio I discuss why I love Tolkien's work and who is the central hero in the Lord of the Rings Trilogy.
item.itunes:keywords: tolkien, lord, rings, harry, potter, hobbit, hero
